com.intuitiv.campus.dao

Class AbstractDao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
        • com.intuitiv.campus.common.HibernateSessionUtils
          • com.intuitiv.campus.dao.AbstractDao<T,PK>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - : the type of the object to access in the database
    PK - : the primary key of the object to access in the database
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dao<T,PK>, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CampusDaoImpl, UserDaoImpl

    public abstract class AbstractDao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>
extends HibernateSessionUtils
implements Dao<T,PK>
    AbstractDao is the CRUD template for DAO implementation
    Author:
    Meidi
